DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyToDibSection (FIBITMAP *src, HBITMAP hbitmap, int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
 Converts FIBITMAP to an existing HBITMAP This produces a dibsection so the image is located in system memory.
DLL_API HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CreateDibSection (HDC hdc, int width, int height, int bpp, int colours_used, RGBQUAD *bmiColours)
 Creates a HBITMAP.

Detailed Description

Provides various methods for converting FIBITMAP's to windows bitmaps.

Function Documentation

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyToDibSection ( FIBITMAP *  src,
HBITMAP  hbitmap,
int  left,
int  top,
int  right,
int  bottom 
)

Converts FIBITMAP to an existing HBITMAP This produces a dibsection so the image is located in system memory.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP to convert.
hbitmap hbitmap to copy the FIBITMAP to.
left the left point of the image subsection to convert.
top the top point of the image subsection to convert.
right the right point of the image subsection to convert.
bottom the bottom point of the image subsection to convert.
Returns:
HBITMAP on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CreateDibSection ( HDC  hdc,
int  width,
int  height,
int  bpp,
int  colours_used,
RGBQUAD *  bmiColours 
)

Creates a HBITMAP.

Parameters:
hdc HDC to use for dibsection.
width Width of HBITMAP.
height Height of HBITMAP.
bpp BPP of HBITMAP.
colours_used number of colours in the HBITMAP.
bmiColours colour Palette.
Returns:
HBITMAP on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_FibToHBitmap ( FIBITMAP *  dib  ) 

Converts FIBITMAP to a HBITMAP This does not produces a dibsection so the image is located in video memory.

Parameters:
dib FIBITMAP to convert.
Returns:
HBITMAP on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API void DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_FreeHBitmap ( HBITMAP  hbitmap  ) 

Frees a HBITMAP.

Parameters:
hbitmap HBITMAP to free.

DLL_API HBITMAP DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_GetDibSection ( FIBITMAP *  src,
HDC  hdc,
int  left,
int  top,
int  right,
int  bottom 
)

Converts FIBITMAP to a HBITMAP This produces a dibsection so the image is located in system memory.

Parameters:
src FIBITMAP to convert.
hdc HDC assciated with the bitmap.
left the left point of the image subsection to convert.
top the top point of the image subsection to convert.
right the right point of the image subsection to convert.
bottom the bottom point of the image subsection to convert.
Returns:
HBITMAP on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_HBitmapToFIB ( HDC  hdc,
HBITMAP  bitmap 
)

Converts a HBITMAP to a FIBITMAP This does not produces a dibsection so the image is located in video memory.

Parameters:
hdc HDC assciated with the bitmap.
bitmap HBITMAP hbitmap to convert.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* on success and NULL on error.
